labels.name: feature/code-coverage
labels.description: Issues related to code coverage (but not php-code-coverage)

issue.title: Must provide `--whitelist` even when Xdebug whitelist script is used

labels.name: type/enhancement
labels.description: A new idea that should be implemented

labels.name: feature/code-coverage
labels.description: Issues related to code coverage (but not php-code-coverage)

issue.body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version     | 8.*
| PHP version         | 7.3
| Installation Method | Any

When using Xdebug coverage filter via the `--prepend` argument, PHPUnit still requires the `--whitelist` argument in order to generate code coverage.

```sh
$ cat ./filter.php
<?php

\xdebug_set_filter(
    \XDEBUG_FILTER_CODE_COVERAGE,
    \XDEBUG_PATH_WHITELIST,
    ['/path/to/project/src']
);

```

```sh
$ phpunit --prepend=./filter.php ./tests/suite --coverage-html=./coverage
> ...
> Error: Incorrect whitelist config, no code coverage will be generated.
> ...
```

When I provide the `--whitelist` argument, it works:

```sh
$ phpunit --dump-xdebug-filter=./filter.php
$ phpunit --prepend=./filter.php ./tests/suite --coverage-html=./coverage --whitelist=/path/to/project/src
> ...
```

---

Or is this the way it is intended to work?

issue.title: Remove coverage allow list generation

repository.name: fundraising-application
repository.description: ðŸ’¶ User facing application for the Wikimedia Deutschland fundraising.

issue.body: PHPUnit deprecated the coverage list parameter (see https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/4226) and our build script was throwing errors.

issue.title: Use Xdebug whitelisting
issue.body:
PHPUnit has now a way to whitelist where to enable Xdebug, to improve performance in code coverage collection: https://thephp.cc/news/2019/01/faster-code-coverage

We could leverage this to improve Paraunit's performances. We would need to check if the feature is usable though, checking or limiting PHPUnit version and checking the Xdebug version too.

issue.title: Remove `xdebug-filter.php` as it's not used and deprecated
issue.body:
See https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/4226

Also, we actually don't use it.
